Package agh.alleviation.presentation.controller.list

Class HallListController

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.presentation.controller.GenericController
agh.alleviation.presentation.controller.list.GenericListController<Hall>
agh.alleviation.presentation.controller.list.HallListController
@Component
@FxmlView("/views/HallList.fxml")
public class HallListController
extends GenericListController<Hall>
Controller responsible for displaying list of halls and control panel, which allows to manipulate them (only adding at the moment)
Author:
Kamil Krzempek
